014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018
019import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.InterpolatorFactory;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.TransformerRegistry;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.NumberDefinition;
024
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.StringJoiner;
028import java.util.regex.Matcher;
029import java.util.regex.Pattern;
030
031import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
032import com.google.common.base.Joiner;
033import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
034
035public final class NumberField extends Field<String, NumberDefinition> {
036
037    private static final Pattern MATCH_GROUPS = Pattern.compile("\\d+|\\D+");
038
039    private final ValueProvider valueProvider;
040
041    private final List<String> elements = Lists.newArrayList();
042    private final List<Integer> numberElements = Lists.newArrayList();
043
044    @VisibleForTesting
045    public static NumberField forTesting(NumberDefinition numberDefinition, ValueProvider valueProvider) {
046        return new NumberField(numberDefinition, valueProvider, InterpolatorFactory.forTesting(), TransformerRegistry.INSTANCE);
047    }
048
049    public NumberField(final NumberDefinition fieldDefinition, final ValueProvider valueProvider,
050        final InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory, final TransformerRegistry transformerRegistry) {
051        super(fieldDefinition, interpolatorFactory, transformerRegistry);
052
053        this.valueProvider = valueProvider;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public String getFieldName() {
058        // This is not the property name (because many definitions can map onto one prop)
059        // but the actual id.
060        return fieldDefinition.getId();
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public String getValue() {
065        parse();
066        final String value = Joiner.on("").join(elements);
067        return formatResult(value);
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public boolean isExposeAsProperty() {
072        return fieldDefinition.isExport();
073    }
074
075    private void parse() {
076        final Optional<String> value = valueProvider.getValue();
077
078        if (value.isPresent()) {
079            final Matcher m = MATCH_GROUPS.matcher(value.get());
080            elements.clear();
081            numberElements.clear();
082
083            while (m.find()) {
084                final String matchValue = m.group();
085                elements.add(matchValue);
086                if (isNumber(matchValue)) {
087                    numberElements.add(elements.size() - 1);
088                }
089            }
090
091            checkState(numberElements.size() > fieldDefinition.getFieldNumber(), "Only %s fields in %s, field %s requested.",
092                numberElements.size(), value, fieldDefinition.getFieldNumber());
093        }
094    }
095
096    private boolean isNumber(final CharSequence c) {
097        for (int i = 0; i < c.length(); i++) {
098            if (!Character.isDigit(c.charAt(i))) {
099                return false;
100            }
101        }
102        return true;
103    }
104
105    public void increment() {
106        final Long value = getNumberValue();
107        if (value != null) {
108            setNumberValue(value + fieldDefinition.getIncrement());
109        }
110    }
111
112    public Long getNumberValue() {
113        parse();
114        return numberElements.isEmpty() ? null : Long.valueOf(elements.get(numberElements.get(fieldDefinition.getFieldNumber())));
115    }
116
117    public void setNumberValue(final Long value) {
118        parse();
119        if (!numberElements.isEmpty()) {
120            elements.set(numberElements.get(fieldDefinition.getFieldNumber()), value.toString());
121            valueProvider.setValue(Joiner.on("").join(elements));
122        }
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public String toString() {
127        return new StringJoiner(", ", NumberField.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
128            .add("numberDefinition=" + fieldDefinition)
129            .add("valueProvider=" + valueProvider)
130            .add("elements=" + elements)
131            .add("numberElements=" + numberElements)
132            .toString();
133    }
134}
